lines: Phons’ intambo yoku’phila kul’iza, Nang’ umfowethu ungamsindisa
O, ngubani ozozidela Aphons’ iNtambo yoK’phila emfela?
Phonsa iNtambo! Yona yoK’phila! Kushon’ omunye namhla.
Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila masinya, Ngani uyalibala kangaka?
Mbon’ esecwila, wenze manje; Ngomkhumbi woKuphila, yana kude.
Phons’ iNtambo yoK’phila kofayo, Eshon’ osizin’ olwesabekayo!
Kuwo esililo amaza, Masinya azomkhukhula amanzi
Sizodlul’ isi’khathi sokulenga, Bawelel’ ogwini lokulahlwa
Kaloku mfowethu, sheshisa! Phons’ iNtambo namuhla basindiswe
